page.title: 04UTTOXETER STREET MARKET
page.content: When we visited the market we did a survey and we found out that 6 stalls come from Uttoxeter, 10 come from Staffordshire,9 from Derbyshire and 12 from other places. This survey shows how many different stalls there were at the market on Wednesday the 15 th May. Market day is also on Saturday. 24 Clothing,4 Drapery,6 Fruit and Veg , 3 Dairy ,3 Hoisery,3 Other Foods , 3 Crockery,3 Plants ,3 White Elephant, 2 Meat ,2 Toys ,2 Haberdashery , 2 Carpets ,2 Bags ,1 Ironmongery , 1 Cushions,1 Linen ,1 Foam Sheets 1 Jewelry ,1 Fish ,1 Knitting , 1 Cards ,1 Hats ,1 Lamp , 1 Trays ,1 Shoes ,1 Gospel Stall. We spoke to a woman from the cheese stall who came 40 miles to market each market day. The pottery man came 30 mile on Wednesday. The hat stall woman came 30 miles each market day.
